properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehovanu nammukonu manavulu i mahilona dhanyulu 2 Ayanapai niriksananu nuncuvaru dhanyulu varu 1{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jalamu yodda natabadina cettuvale adi yundunu 2, Kalvala yoranu veá¸·lu tannunu kadaladu tuphanu galulunna 2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vetta kaliginanu bhayapadadu akulu paccaga nundunu 2, Varsamuleni sanvatsaramuna cintincadu kapu manadu 2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hrdayamu annitikante bahu mosakaramainadi 2, Adi ghoramaina dustatvamainadi dini neruguvarevvaru 2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehova nagu nenu pariksintu andari antarindramulanu 2, Prativani kriyala pravartananu batti nenu pratiphalamittunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O yehova parama tandri israyeladharuda 2, Ninnu visarjincu varandarilalo sigu nondedaru gaka 2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Drohulu nannu visarjinciri jiva jala utanaina nannu 2, Isuka mida peru vraya badinatlu attivari peru nunduga 2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Deva nannu svasthaparacu nenu svasthata nondedanu 2, Deva raksincumu raksimpa badudunu na sotramulaku adharuda 2{/lang-eng}
